Personalized Deals

Every customer sees different deals based on their profile. Heavy spenders get exclusive perks. Infrequent visitors get incentives to return.

Automated Campaigns

Network Effect

The Collective Power of 500+ Shops

When customers earn rewards everywhere, everyone wins.

üåê

Universal Rewards

Customers earn at any shop, redeem anywhere. Your shop becomes part of a lifestyle, not just a location.

üìç

Density Effects

3+ shops per zip code creates 3x engagement. We strategically build density to maximize your returns.

üîç

Discovery Engine

Customers discover your shop through the app when nearby. Built-in customer acquisition at no extra cost.

üîÑ

Reciprocal Traffic

Your regulars visit other shops while traveling. Their customers discover you when in your area. Everyone wins.

üìä

Shared Intelligence

AI learns from 500+ shops to optimize offers. What works at one shop improves recommendations for all.
